The British School of Guangzhou
Dear Parents,
This is a gentle reminder that 'Orientation Day' for new families & 'Meet the Teacher Day' for all families will both take place next Friday, 22nd August 2014.
For specific information relating to your child or children, please click the appropriate links below:
- EARLY YEARS (Pre-Nursery, Nursery & Reception)
- PRIMARY SCHOOL (Year 1 to Year 6)
- SECONDARY SCHOOL (Year 7 to 13)
We are very much looking forward to welcoming you all back for the beginning of the school year 2014/15.
Best wishes,
The British School of Guangzhou
